activities:
We collect the following information from members of our testing community ("testers"): name, email address, city, country, gender, and birth year.  Information is self-submitted by testers upon joining the community.

Testers are assigned projects testing mobile apps and devices of Applause's customers and are paid based on the results of their tests.  The information we collect is used to assign testers to appropriate projects, contact them about projects, and process payments.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer and tester data are covered. Manually processed data is included for both.
